name: Omastar

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Omastar but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. You can't add more than 20 damage in this way.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: A prehistoric Pok√©mon that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible for it to catch prey.

strengths: Water Gun scales with extra energy
Spike Cannon can do up to 60 damage
weaknesses: Stage 2 from Mysterious Fossil is slow
Spike Cannon is coin flip dependent

competitiveHistory: Omastar suffered from being a Stage 2 with only 70 HP. The evolution line starting from Mysterious Fossil made setup slow and vulnerable. While the attacks were decent, the fragility of the card limited competitive play.

rulings.ruling: Water Gun's bonus damage only counts Water Energy beyond what was used to pay the cost.
Spike Cannon does 0 damage if both coins are tails.
Omastar evolves from Omanyte, which evolves from Mysterious Fossil.
